nodes.text: Mesan was a Human male who maintained a shop on the Promenade, on the planet Nar Shaddaa, during the Cold War. Mesan sold blasters in addition to other weaponry.
Mesan was created for Star Wars: The Old Republic, a massively multiplayer online role-playing game released by BioWare on December 20, 2011. He appears on Nar Shaddaa as a weapons vendor.
